line.comment: * called by ZH.Core or Mayhem.Conquer when the last Xenon sector falls
* OCV construction slows down greatly and everyone is more likely to sign truces for some time
* go back to original relations from the Galaxy Generator and reactivate player permanent wars
* for the player we also need to check if he didnt already break his truce
* if he is still clean we extend his truce timer one last time
* all others sign another truce if possible
* NPC empires always want to refresh their truces until the next AI cycle can update this desire properly
*Terracorp dissolving the UNC and potential Amnesty for player

sval.val: called by ZH.Core or Mayhem.Conquer when the last Xenon sector falls
OCV construction slows down greatly and everyone is more likely to sign truces for some time
go back to original relations from the Galaxy Generator and reactivate player permanent wars
for the player we also need to check if he didnt already break his truce
if he is still clean we extend his truce timer one last time
all others sign another truce if possible
NPC empires always want to refresh their truces until the next AI cycle can update this desire properly
Terracorp dissolving the UNC and potential Amnesty for player
